input.sentences: went to go check out a crashed truck
it has a lot of damage the from passenger side
the front bumper is completely ruined
the hood of the car is destroyed
the driver side looks to have taken the worst hit
output.sentences: I went to go make sure my crashed truck was put in the back lot.
The passenger of the oncoming vehicle said his car incurred damage too.
The front end of my truck was completely ruined.
The hood on his car was destroyed.
This was proably the worst hit I've experienced by another driver.
